overview_of_class: This is the third quarter of a three-quarter sequence of Intermediate German. Students will continue to increase their proficiency in speaking, listening, reading, and writing German. We will read and work with Kafka's Die Verwandlung (Metamorphosis). To conclude the year we will also study and discuss recent political and cultural debates in Germany.
name: Intermediate German
subject: GERMAN
